ThingDef.label: Alphapack honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by Alphapack bees. Expert geneticists, they will analyze surrounding animals and plants and extract genetic markers to store on their combs. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get honey, beeswax and random Alphapacks.

ThingDef.label: Mixedpack honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by Mixedpack bees. Expert geneticists, they will analyze surrounding animals and plants and extract genetic markers to store on their combs. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get honey, beeswax and random Mixedpacks.

ThingDef.label: Genetweaking honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by Genetweaking bees. The Genetweaking Bee is a bio-engineered marvel that produces strange gene-tweaking artifacts. Colonists can use these artifacts to modify their genetic makeup. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get honey, beeswax and random Gene tweaking artifacts.
